subject: Mastering Slot Machines.How to Earn 1000 Dollars a Day
body:
Would you like to discover the secrets slot owners 
are hiding from you and make 1000 Dollars every time 
YOU play the slots? 


http://kiteumpire.com/t/qqdd6-j-h/271217


Bill Stone - which some people call America's
*Professor* of Slot Machines - has just put
together a new book on the topic...

Here's some headings from the book:

* The 2 Minutes System that will tell you exactly 
the payout percentage of the Slot Machines you are 
playing, no matter where or when. It works for 
every single Slot Machine in the world.
	
* The inner workings of the machines.  Knowing how 
they work gives you a big advantage. You will finally 
know how they end up taking your money or giving 
you the big jackpot!


http://kiteumpire.com/t/qqdd6-j-h/271217


* Discover where and when a machine is going to payoff 
most of their money. Follow this simple secret I used 
to win 36,433.74 in one day and I didn't need a big 
bankroll either. You can do it the same way!

* Discover how to use the other players as your personal
slots detectives! This 5 minute system will take 
advantage of other players to skyrocket your earnings!

* The secrets of money management and increasing your bankroll.
Most people don't know when to stop and they end up losing more
to the machine instead of going home with the money. This 
is what separates professionals from amateurs.

* Discover How to Make a Minimum of 1000 Dollars every night 
at the slots in less than an hour.


http://kiteumpire.com/t/qqdd6-j-h/271217
